channel.title: Stats Reset
channel.description:
Okay so when I do the ::master command i get all 99 stat combat skills. But then when I logout and log back in 2 skills have basically resteted. The skills are Magic and Health. But there not actually level 1. When you use a magic attack it resets back to 99 and when you get hit by a npc or a player it restes ur HP back to 99? I have no clue were fix this bug!!
Help would be very appreciated!
Thanks!
Nic

item.title: Stats Reset
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
